rukus.text: arau niscaya i'unucho achila raachulasakalara antarbhukta
Smarana karaa, yetiya te'om boja'i nauyanara pine pala'i ga’la
Tara pichata te'om lataraita yogadana karaile arau tata te'om paraabhuta sakalara antarbhukta ha’la
Tara pichata eta danara mache te'omka gili pelale, arau te'om nijake dhikkara di achila
Arau te'om yadi allahara paraitrata arau mahima ghosanakarai sakalara antarbhukta naha’lehemtena
tente te'om punaraut'thanara dina laike machara petate'i thakilehemtena
Arasesata te'omka ami niksepa karailo eta trnahina tha'ita, arau te'om achila asustha
Arau ami tara oparata iyakatina prajatira eta gacha gaja'i tulilo
arau te'omka ami eka lakha ba tatokai bechi lokara ocarata praerana karailo
Eteke te'omloke imana anichila, phalata ami te'omlokaka kichu kalara babe jiranopabhoga karaibalai dilo
Eteke sihamtaka sodhacona, ‘(e'ito kenekuraa katha) tomara pratipalakara babe kan'ya santana arau sihamtara babe putra santana’
athaba ami phiraistasakalaka narairaupe srsti karaichilo neki ye, seya sihamte dekhichila
jani thoraa, niscaya sihamte manesaja katha kaya ye
‘allahe santana janma diche’. Niscaya sihamta michaliya
Te'om putra santanara paraibarte kan'ya santana pachanda karaiche neki
ki haiche tomalokara? Tomaloke kenekuraa bicara karaa
tente tomaloke upadesa grahana nakaraibane
ne tomalokara kono suspasta dalila-pramana ache
yadi tomaloke satyabadi tente tomalokara kitaba lai aha
Sihamte allaha arau jina jatira majata atmiyatara samparka sthira karaiche, athaca jinabilake jane ye, niscaya sihamtaka upasthita karaa ha’ba (sastira babe)
Sihamte yi araopa karae tara paraa allaha paraitra arau mahana
kerala allahara ekanistha bandasakalara bahirae
Niscaya tomaloke arau tomaloke yiborara ibadata karaa se'iborae
(ekanistha bandasakalara) kako tomaloke allaha samparke bibhraanta karaiba noraaraiba
kerala prajjbalita ju'ita yijana dagdha ha’ba tara bahirae
Arau (jibraile ka’le) ‘amara pratyekarae babe ache nirdharaita sthana
‘arau niscaya ami saraibad'dhabharae dandayamana
‘arau niscaya ami te'omra paraitrata arau mahima ghosanakarai’
Arau sihamte (makkabasibilake) arasye kaichila
‘purbarartisakalara darae yadi amarao ekhana upadesamulaka kitaba thakilehemtena
‘tente arasye ami allahara ekanistha banda ha’lohemtena’
Kintu sihamte seya (kora'anaka) asbikara karaile, eteke anatipalame sihamte janibalai paba
Niscaya amara praeraita bandasakalara bisaye amara e'i katha purbe'i nirdharaita haiche ye
niscaya te'omloka sahayyapraapta ha’ba
Arau niscaya amara sain'yabahiniye'i bijayi ha’ba
Eteke kichu samayara babe tumi sihamtara paraa mukha ghuraa'i thaka
Arau tumi sihamtaka paryabeksana karaa, atisighrae sihamte dekhibalai paba (iyara parainama)
Sihamte amara sasti tbaraanbita karaiba bicarae neki
eteke yetiya sihamtara cotalata sasti nami ahiba tetiya satarkakrta bilakara prabhata kimana ye nikrsta ha’ba
arau kichu samayara babe tumi sihamtara paraa mukha ghuraa'i thaka
Tumi sihamtaka paryabeksana karaa, atisighrae sihamte dekhibalai paba (iyara parainama)
Sihamte yi araopa karae, tara paraa tomara raba paraitra arau mahana, sakalo ksamatara adhikarai
Arau santi barsita ha'omka raachulasakalara prati
Arau sakalo dharanara prasansa kerala srstijagatara raba allaharae'i praapya
